member.name: EC_SUBSCRIPTION_DELIVERY_MODE
member.summary: The EC_SUBSCRIPTION_DELIVERY_MODE enumeration defines values that indicate how events are delivered in a subscription. Events are delivered through subscriptions using either the push or pull model. For more information, see Subscribing to Events.

member.name: EC_SUBSCRIPTION_DELIVERY_MODE.EcDeliveryModePull
member.summary: Events are delivered through the subscription using the pull model.

member.name: EC_SUBSCRIPTION_DELIVERY_MODE.EcDeliveryModePush
member.summary: Events are delivered through the subscription using the push model.
